======Sets the maximum lifetime of ranger projectiles.======

= Description =

Sets the maximum lifetime of ranger projectiles, thus determining their maximum range based on this value and <!--[asw_ranger_spit_speed]-->[[asw_ranger_spit_speed.wiki|asw_ranger_spit_speed]].
